CustomField.description: Created this field to fix the display format of billing address on the order form template - SpotDraft
CustomField.formula: BLANKVALUE(BillingStreet,"") & IF(ISBLANK(BillingCity),"", ",") & IF(ISBLANK(BillingCity),""," ") & BLANKVALUE(BillingCity, "") & IF(ISBLANK(BillingState),"",",") & IF(ISBLANK(BillingState),""," ") & BLANKVALUE(BillingState, "") & IF(ISBLANK(BillingPostalCode),"", ",") & IF(ISBLANK(BillingPostalCode),""," ") & BLANKVALUE(BillingPostalCode, "") & IF(ISBLANK(BillingCountry),"",",") & IF(ISBLANK(BillingCountry),""," ") & BLANKVALUE(BillingCountry, "")
CustomField.label: SpotDraft Billing Address
